name: Laura Veirs
description: '''Laura Pauline Veirs''' (born October 24, 1973) is an American singer-songwriter based in [[Portland, Oregon]]. She is known for her [[folk music|folk]] and [[alternative country]] records and live performances as well as her collaboration with [[Neko Case]] and [[k.d. lang]] on the [[case/lang/veirs]] project. Veirs has written a children's book and hosts a podcast about parenting and performing.
